name: Monster Box Lite
description:
Monster Box Lite is a reaction game to test how fast you can be in identify differences. It is addictive, intuitive, simple and beautiful.

Do you have an iPad? Try the Monster Box HD version.

Check out the trailer: http://www.youtube.com/renatoxpessanha

Some cute little monsters will jump from a box and you have to explode the different one. But don't think it will be easy. You have a short time to do it. If you tap the right monster when the time bar is still green, for sometimes in a row, you will be prized with the Star Monster. Collecting this special monster let you unlock new levels* with new items that will let your life a little bit harder.

This app was carefully designed to provide you hours of fun in an wonderful interface with amazing music and funny sound effects.

Game Center integration let you compare your performance with your friends. You can also post your best score to your friends in Twitter and Facebook.

Continuous support with free content updates. New gameplay modes, new items to unlock and even more secret surprises will be added in future!

Experience everything that Monster Box can offer.

Enjoy!


*This Lite version is ad supported.
